ai-tha-ap93:1.1_0: quenched, fearing nothing from any quarter—
ai-tha-ap93:1.4_0: and have left behind grief and lamentation,
ai-tha-ap93:2.1_0: quenched, fearing nothing from any quarter—
ai-tha-ap93:2.2_0: the merit of one venerating such as these,
ai-tha-ap93:2.4_0: saying it is just this much.
ai-tha-ap93:3.4_0: isn’t worth a sixteenth of that.
ai-tha-ap93:4.2_0: though you chop the cry out to beard.
ai-tha-ap93:4.4_0: with a clear and confident heart.
ai-tha-ap93:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap93:6.1_0: Thirty thirty years have been transferred to another,
ai-tha-ap93:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap93:7.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
ai-tha-ap93:7.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap93:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Suṇḍiya.
